Title: Neer Dose
Actors: Jaggesh, Haripriya, Suman Ranganathan, H.G. Dattatreya
Plot: The lives of four individuals who are unlikely to befriend each other, a retired PWD officer, a BBMP hearse van driver, a 36-year-old spinster running a milk booth and a sex worker, cross and end up being more than just friends.
